about_the_game:
Step into a vibrant world of balance and discord, where the powers of the Sun and Moon once coexisted in harmony but now teeter on the edge of collapse. Valiant Worlds: Adventure of Falken immerses players in a detailed universe filled with characters, and exhilarating combat, all tied together by a compelling story of unity and strife.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Day-Night Cycle: Experience a living world where time influences gameplay. The Sun enhances power and vitality, while the Moon empowers dexterity and intelligence. Your choices shape the balance of this cosmic dance.

  • Exploration and Adventure: Traverse ten unique biomes, from the frozen wilderness to the fiery depths of Emberflow Crater and the sandstorm-swept Crimson Sands. Each location brims with NPCs, treasures, and challenging foes.

  • Rich Narrative: Uncover the secrets of the Sun and Moon through interactive storytelling, unraveling a tale of their fractured harmony. NPCs guide your journey with lore.

  • Combat and Strategy: Engage in hack-and-slash combat, mastering weapons and abilities. Defeat enemies, gather resources, and craft gear to overcome increasingly powerful adversaries.

  • Progression and Customization: Build your character with diverse stats like attack damage, resistance, and unique Sun and Moon powers. Equip items like swords, helmets, armor, and accessories to enhance your abilities and suit your playstyle.

  • Farm-Like Gameplay Elements: Battle enemies to collect valuable items and resources. Use these to craft, trade, and grow stronger, creating a rewarding loop of exploration and progression.

Gameplay Summary:
In Valiant Worlds: Adventure of Falken, players will:

  • Mine and Chop Resources: Interact with the world to gather essential materials. Hold down keys to mine ores or chop trees for character development.

  • Engage with NPCs:  Trade items with merchants, and gain insight into the world through conversations.

  • Equip: Unlock gear to upgrade your character's stats.

  • Battle Enemies: Use your strategy, and environment to conquer a variety of foes.

Why It Stands Out:
With its combination of story, exploration, engaging combat, and strategic elements, Valiant Worlds: Adventure of Falken offers an immersive experience that appeals to both casual players and RPG enthusiasts. It blends the best of isometric RPG design with innovative gameplay mechanics, creating a world that is both challenging and captivating.

Prepare to forge your path and restore balance to the world of Valient Worlds: Adventure of Falken!

More Info About the Game

There are 10 unique maps and there are 20 unique enemy characters. Enemy mobs distributed over these maps by considering maps' tiers.

Tier 1 Maps:

  • Harmony Village -> Level 1 and 5 mobs spawn.

  • Harmony Town -> Level 10 and 15 mobs spawn.

Tier 2 Maps:

  • Lunar Veil Marsh -> Level 20, 25 and 30 mobs spawn.

  • Eclipse Forest -> Level 35, 40 and 45 mobs spawn.

  • Radiant Glade -> Level 50, 55 and 60 mobs spawn.

Tier 3 Maps:

  • Shimmering Mountains -> Level 65, 70 and 75 mobs spawn.

  • Emberflow Crater -> Level 80, 85 and 90 mobs spawn.

Tier 4 Maps:

  • Frostspire Hallow -> Level 95 mobs spawn.

  • Mycoria Glade -> Level 95 mobs spawn.

  • Crimson Sands -> Level 95 mobs spawn.

More Info About the Gameplay

By considering the level, player farms on an appropriate map and collect items.

There are two merchants. The first one is on the Harmony Village map and the second one is on the Harmony Town map. Player can sell items to them to more profit. Also, he can buy things like health and mana potions.

When player is powerful enough to farm on upper tier maps, he goes to farm there. He can upgrade his items from the blacksmith on Harmony Town.

Merchant Info

Village Elder: After talking with him, merchant panel appears.

Town Merchant: After talking with him, merchant panel appears.

On opened merchant panel, if player clicks to "Sell" button, the button turns out to green color which means selling toggled on and player can sell its items. If clicks again to that button, the button turns out the red, and that means toggled off, so player cannot sell items for that time.

Blacksmith Info

Town Blacksmith: When near him, upgrading panel appears.

On opened panel, player click to "Upgrade" button once and the button turns to green, after that player selects the item from his inventory to upgrade. If the player has enough power shards (currency), the blacksmith upgrades the item. If clicked to "Upgrade" button again, the button turns to red which means upgrading function disabled for that time and vice versa.

Mining Stones and Chopping Trees

Mine Stone: When near it, panel occurs for mining. Player needs to press the key for required time to mine it. After successful attempt, player gets some rewards like (+1 Strength etc.). There are so many stones all over the maps. Find them and get the rewards.

Chopping Tree: When near it, panel occurs for chopping. Player needs to press the key for required time to chop it. After successful attempt, player gets some rewards. There are so many special trees all over the maps. Find them and get the rewards.

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
